TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReflectionTypeLoadException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class ReflectionTypeLoadException Inherits SystemException
public ref class ReflectionTypeLoadException sealed : SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown by the method if any of the classes in a module cannot be loaded. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_REFLECTIONTYPELOAD that has the value 0x80131602.
An instance contains the array of classes (Types property) that were defined in the module and were loaded. The array can contain some null values. There is also another array of exceptions (`LoaderExceptions` property). This exception array represents the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions.
This exception exposes both the array of classes and the array of `TypeLoadExceptions`.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

An array of type containing the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. The null reference ( in Visual Basic) values in the array line up with the exceptions in this array.

MemberSignature.Value: public Exception[] LoaderExceptions { get; }
.property instance class System.Exception[] LoaderExceptions
Public ReadOnly Property LoaderExceptions As Exception()
public: property cli::array <Exception ^> ^ LoaderExceptions { cli::array <Exception ^> ^ get(); };
member this.LoaderExceptions : Exception[]

Docs.summary: Gets the array of exceptions thrown by the class loader.
Docs.value: An array of type containing the exceptions thrown by the class loader. The null values in the array of this instance line up with the exceptions in this array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions%2A> property retrieves an array of type `Exception` that is parallel to the <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types%2A> array. This array will contain null values whenever reflection cannot load a class.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type[] Types { get; }

member this.Types : Type[]

Docs.summary: Gets the array of classes that were defined in the module and loaded.
Docs.value: An array of type containing the classes that were defined in the module and loaded. This array can contain some values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions%2A> property retrieves an array of type `Exception` that is parallel to this `Types` array. This array will contain null values whenever reflection cannot load a class.
